name: recompilation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of compiling a computer program (= changing it into a machine language) for a second, third, etc. time: Recompilation is required to take advantage of these new capabilities. The app will work without needing changes or re-compilation.
More examplesFewer examplesCatalogue card updates are possible without re-compilation of the source code.That way, previously existing programs can run on totally new hardware without requiring revision and recompilation.If you have the source code, recompilation is recommended.
